documentation.text:
@title ERC721BookTradable
 ERC721BookTradable - Book Tradable ERC721 contract whitelists a trading address with minting functionality.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only owner and marketplace can mint tokens."

arguments.value: Only owner and marketplace can mint tokens.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only owner and marketplace can mint tokens."

documentation.text:
@dev Mints a token to an address with a tokenURI.
 @param _to address of the future owner of the token

@dev calculates the next token ID based on value of _currentTokenId
 @return uint256 for the next token ID
This is used instead of msg.sender as transactions won't be sent by the original token owner, but by OpenSea.
